UI.noInput: Please answer before viewing the solution

question: Which of the following is a valid chained decision statement?

answers.text:
if condition_1:
  # Body 1
elif condition_2:
  # Body 2

tipsAndFeedback.chosenFeedback: The statement will produce an error because the elif is not chained to a preceding statement. An elif must follow a statement the elif is chained to.

answers.text:
if condition_1:
  # Body 1
  elif condition_2:
    # Body 2

tipsAndFeedback.chosenFeedback: The statement will produce an error because the if and elif are not on the same indentation level. The elif must be chained to a statement on the same indentation level.

answers.text:
elif condition_1:
  # Body 1
if condition_2:
  # Body 2

tipsAndFeedback.chosenFeedback: The elif must be chained to a preceding statement and at the same indentation level.

detailedSolution: The elif must be chained to a preceding statement and at the same indentation level.
